context: Hello, what can you recommend for action movies?
Deadpool 2 (2018) just came out. My brother really liked it.
I have not seen Deadpool 2 (2018) yet, not sure if I want to see it.
kinda, it seems. What about something along the lines of Bad Boys (1995)
There's The 15-17 to Paris . Clint Eastwood directed it
I have not seen The 15-17 to Paris but I am really interested in it!, thanks for the suggestion. What do you have in mind for a comedy?
Ocean's 8 (2018) Sandra Bullock is always hilarious
Oh i've heard of Ocean's 8 (2018) I haven't seen it yet, but I would like too.
It'll be out in a couple of week. I'm going to check it out. Hope you like it.
thanks, I'm sure I will. one more genre what's a good movie for kids
resp: Moana (2016) It's great. And visually it was just stunning
